pullRequest.title: Setup Search module to interact with the Search Rest Client API.
pullRequest.bodyText:
#1306
Checklist

 the [contributor license agreement][] is signed
 commit message follows [commit guidelines][]
 tests are included
 screenshots are included showing significant UI changes
 documentation is changed or added

Description of change
The Search module provides a function that interacts with REST Client API to do a search.

commit.message:
Setup Search module to interact with the Search Rest Client API.

Add a Jest test with mock data for the module.

nodes.bodyText: Could we have some JSDoc please?

nodes.bodyText: I swear I've seen this constant just like this in other modules. Is it worth centralizing it somewhere?

commit.message: Centralise the REST API base url.
